explanations.reason: The paper focuses on the interdependence of financial markets, including green bonds, cryptocurrency, commodities, and other financial markets during the COVID-19 period. It employs time-varying parameter vector autoregression and Quantile regression methods, which are statistical and econometric techniques, not machine learning or deep learning methods. None of the provided keywords related to machine learning, neural networks, or other AI techniques are mentioned or implied in the title or abstract.
